entry.source: {F812}Haggard man\0{F87A,79}{F813,1,403613}They supposedly have members-only{F801}stores in the shopping district of{F801}Ginza.{F801}{F802}I hear everything is pretty damn{F801}pricy. entry.source: {F812}Haggard man\0{F87A,79}{F813,1,403613}I can't believe Lady Yuriko's been{F801}defeated... How could anyone in this{F801}world be so strong!?{F801}{F802}A weakling like me will never{F801}survive... There's no way...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,404401}How could a frail woman like me come{F801}all this way?{F801}{F802}Well, not even the Ring of Gaea{F801}members can resist my feminine{F801}charms.{F801}{F802}But I'm nothing compared to Lady{F801}Yuriko, though...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,404401}I was right to come to this city.{F801}I can tell that I'll be able to{F801}polish my skills even more.{F801}{F802}This is all thanks to Lady Yuriko.{F801}We've lost such an amazing woman...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,404401}I was right to come to this city.{F801}I can tell that I'll be able to{F801}polish my skills even more.{F801}{F802}This is all thanks to Lady Yuriko.{F801}We've lost such an amazing woman...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,404441}This place is going to be overrun{F801}by demons? Fine by me. Bring it on,{F801}I say.{F801}{F802}Facing off against demons will help{F801}me improve my skills even more...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,404431}I've thought back on Lady Yuriko's{F801}beauty, and I've reached a conclusion.{F801}{F802}Strength isn't all about muscular{F801}power. Looking at me, don't you{F801}agree? Femininity is real strength.{F801}{F802}Men may be the ones that move this{F801}world, but any man can be controlled{F801}by a woman. That is the real power.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,416100}So, a champion has been born among{F801}the common folk?{F801}{F802}Well, then, since I've made it this{F801}far on my own charms...{F801}{F802}I must be the champion of women.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-606}{F813,1,411201}To be honest, I don't care if I have{F801}to live as a human or a demon. I just{F801}don't want to be bored.{F801}{F802}But if the Demon Lord falls, will{F801}humans reign again?{F801}{F802}Will I be caught like back then, too?{F801}
